com.pvsagar.smartlockscreen.applogic_objects.passphrases

Class Pin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pvsagar.smartlockscreen.baseclasses.Passphrase<java.lang.String>
      • com.pvsagar.smartlockscreen.applogic_objects.passphrases.Pin

  • public class Pin
extends Passphrase<java.lang.String>
    Created by aravind on 8/9/14. Pin class which represents a numeric passphrase. String is used as representation to accommodate potential zeroes in the beginning of the pin
